ALTER PROCEDURE dbo.usp_UpdateTableStatusandHistory   
    @SchemaName nvarchar(50),   
    @TableName nvarchar(50)  ,
    @DataLossPercentage int,
    @HugeDataLossPercentage int,
    @LatestTotalSize BIGINT,
    @LatestTotalRows BIGINT
AS   
 
-----------------------Update History Table------------------------------------- 
insert into audit.Table_Stats_History(db_id,db_name,schema_id,schema_name,tbl_id,tbl_name,total_size,total_rows,created_date)
select   db_id,db_name,schema_id,schema_name,tbl_id,tbl_name,latest_total_size,latest_total_rows,getdate()
from audit.Table_Status
WHERE SCHEMA_NAME=@SchemaName and tbl_name=@TableName
 
 ;

-----------------------Perform  Merge------------------------------------- 
 

With CTE_Table_Status
as (
SELECT top 1 [db_id],[db_name],[schema_id],[schema_name],tbl_id,tbl_name,NULL as max_total_size,NULL as max_total_rows,@LatestTotalSize as latest_total_size, @LatestTotalRows as latest_total_rows,
(CASE WHEN 100-(ISNULL(cast(@LatestTotalRows as float),0)/isnull(cast(total_rows as float),0)*100)>=@DataLossPercentage then 1 else 0 end ) as DataLossFlag,
(CASE WHEN 100-(ISNULL(cast(@LatestTotalRows as float),0)/isnull(cast(total_rows as float),0)*100)>=@HugeDataLossPercentage then 1 else 0 end ) HugeDataLossFlag,
GETDATE() AS updated_Date
FROM audit.Table_Stats_History A
WHERE [SCHEMA_NAME]=@SchemaName and tbl_name=@TableName
AND created_Date=(Select max(created_Date) from audit.Table_Stats_History
where [SCHEMA_NAME]=a.[SCHEMA_NAME] and tbl_name=a.tbl_name)

)


 MERGE audit.Table_Status AS Target
    USING CTE_Table_Status	AS Source
    ON Source.tbl_id = Target.tbl_id and  Source.[schema_id] = Target.[schema_id]
    
    -- For Inserts
    WHEN NOT MATCHED BY Target THEN
        INSERT ([db_id],[db_name], [schema_id],[schema_name],tbl_id,tbl_name,max_total_size,max_total_rows,latest_total_size,
        latest_total_rows,data_loss_fl,huge_data_fl,updated_date) 
        VALUES (Source.[db_id],Source.[db_name], Source.[schema_id],Source.[schema_name],Source.tbl_id,Source.tbl_name,
        Source.max_total_size,Source.max_total_rows,Source.latest_total_size,
        Source.latest_total_rows,Source.DataLossFlag,Source.HugeDataLossFlag,Source.updated_date)
    
    -- For Updates
    WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
        Target.max_total_size	= Source.max_total_size,
        Target.max_total_rows	= Source.max_total_rows,
        Target.latest_total_size= Source.latest_total_size,
        Target.latest_total_rows= Source.latest_total_rows,
	    Target.data_loss_fl= Source.DataLossFlag,
        Target.huge_data_fl		= Source.HugeDataLossFlag,
        Target.updated_date		= Source.updated_date
        ;



GO
